pitch: Escape the crowds and explore Sumbawa's raw beauty and powerful waves like Lakey Peak.

name: Peniche
pitch: Surf Portugal's consistent beach breaks and point breaks, including the famous Supertubos.

name: Sharm El Sheikh
pitch: Dive into the crystal-clear waters of the Red Sea and explore vibrant coral reefs teeming with marine life.

name: Raja Ampat
pitch: Discover the world's epicenter of marine biodiversity in this remote Indonesian archipelago.

name: Cozumel
pitch: Drift dive along the Palacar Reef and experience the thrill of Cozumel's strong currents.

name: Baa Atoll
pitch: Swim with manta rays and whale sharks in this UNESCO Biosphere Reserve in the Maldives.

name: Great Blue Hole
pitch: Descend into the depths of this iconic sinkhole and witness the unique geological formations.

name: Komodo National Park
pitch: Dive with manta rays, sharks, and vibrant coral in this park that is also home to the Komodo dragon.

name: Andaman Islands
pitch: Discover pristine reefs and unique marine life in this remote Indian archipelago.

name: Bay Islands
pitch: Dive or snorkel the Mesoamerican Barrier Reef, home to whale sharks and vibrant coral gardens.

name: Bunaken National Park
pitch: Wall dive among amazing marine biodiversity in the heart of the Coral Triangle.

name: Maui
pitch: Surf, dive and explore volcanic landscapes on the second largest of the Hawaiian Islands.

name: Galapagos Islands
pitch: Swim with marine iguanas and sea lions among unique wildlife found nowhere else on Earth.

name: Similan Islands
pitch: Explore stunning underwater rock formations and encounter diverse marine life.

name: Tubbataha Reefs Natural Park
pitch: A world heritage site with prolific marine life including sharks, manta rays and diverse coral reefs.
